title: Beetroot, Parmesan and cashew dip

ingredients.content: 80 g Parmesan cheese, crust removed and cut into cubes (3 cm)
450 g canned baby beetroot (reserve1 tbsp beetroot liquid), remaining liquid drained
1 pinch ground black pepper, to taste
1 spring onion/shallot, trimmed and finely sliced for garnishing

preparations.content: Place Parmesan and garlic into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place cashews into mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add beetroot, reserved 1 tbsp beetroot liquid and reserved grated Parmesan and garlic and blend <b>6 sec/speed 5<b>.

Add lemon juice, season to taste with salt and pepper, then mix <b>3 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer into a sealable container and place into refrigerator until ready to serve. Garnish dip with spring onion/shallot and serve chilled.

hintsAndTricks: This dip is best made in advance, as the flavours develop over a couple of days.
Serve your dip with some of the Herbed lavosh (see pg. X) on the side.
